projects.name: One-Time-Pad Generator (2017)
projects.description: A vigenere cipher that shifts based on a unicode character. Any string underneath roughly 1M characters in length is assigned a one-time-pad key

projects.name: NetworKING (2019)
projects.description: [WORK IN PROGRESS] An Angular Web Application designed to represents one's professional netowork as an undirected sociograph. Powered by a Flask/Python Backend and uses an SQL Database.

projects.name: Cumulative Model for Casual Expenses (2019)
projects.description: Displays a cumulative expense graph based on a user-defined list of expenses. Intended to model casual expenses such as gas, coffee, and food.

projects.name: Linear Regression from Scratch (2019)
projects.description: Manualy calculates the correlation coefficients for a given set of independent variables.

projects.name: Naive Bayes Classifier from Scratch (2019)
projects.description: Manually reads in the counts of a feature matrix and response vector and classifies an input based on Bayes Theorem.

projects.name: Shell Project (2019)
projects.description: Simple unix shell developed in C++

projects.name: RSA Encrypter & Decrypter (2019)
projects.description: Small Python Scripts for simple RSA Encryption and Decryption

projects.name: Naive Gaussian Elimination from Scratch + Scaled Partial Pivoting (2019)
projects.description: Simple Python Scripts for Naive and SPP Gausian Elimination from Scratch

projects.name: Root-Finder (bisection, newton, secant) (2019)
projects.description: Simple Python Scripts for finding the roots of a nonlinear function. (Bisection Method, Newton's Method, Secant Method)

projects.name: Synthetic Division / Horner's Method (2019)
projects.description: Simple Python Script that takes the list of coefficients of a polynomial and factors out a value.
